page.title: 14A School Today
page.content: The architect won an award for his design of St Anthony's,RC, Scotland Rd a tall building with panoramic views. { Features include a library, an audio {-visual room and large resource areas. {Outside are large playing fields, {yards and garden plots for the pupils. { }When it was suggested that, with secondary reorganisation, the school could absorb first year seniors, a large classroom was converted into a science unit,with laboratory equipment at one end and domestic science equipment at the other. {The plan was not pursued & the unit {has given the junior school a boost. This summer will see important change on the site. Alterations & extra rooms will make provision for infant pupils, in spite of the fact that the school's future is uncertain until primary reorganisation in two years time.
